meanings.definition: The philosophy founded by Rudolf Steiner that emphasizes the spiritual and mystical aspects of human existence.
meanings.sent1: Studying anthroposophy helps us explore the spiritual side of life.
meanings.sent2: Many people find comfort in the teachings of anthroposophy.
meanings.sent3: Learning about anthroposophy feels like discovering a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The essence of anthroposophy is like a gentle whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: Anthroposophy paints a vivid picture of the interconnectedness of all things.

meanings.definition: The study of spiritual wisdom and the evolution of human consciousness.
meanings.sent1: Anthroposophy delves into the depths of human consciousness.
meanings.sent2: Students of anthroposophy seek enlightenment through spiritual wisdom.
meanings.sent3: Exploring anthroposophy is like embarking on a journey of self-discovery.
meanings.sent4: The growth of anthroposophy mirrors the blossoming of a flower in spring.
meanings.sent5: In the realm of anthroposophy, wisdom shines like a beacon in the night.

meanings.definition: A belief system that seeks to understand the spiritual nature of humanity and the universe.
meanings.sent1: Anthroposophy offers insights into the spiritual essence of the universe.
meanings.sent2: Believers in anthroposophy find solace in the interconnectedness of all things.
meanings.sent3: Discussing anthroposophy with friends can lead to fascinating conversations.
meanings.sent4: The roots of anthroposophy run deep, connecting us to the cosmos.
meanings.sent5: In the tapestry of beliefs, anthroposophy weaves a thread of unity.
